def_cn: 剧目轮演;轮流上演选定剧目
def_en: A repertory company is a group of actors and actresses who perform a small number of plays for just a few weeks at a time. They work in a repertory theatre.

def_cn: （一个演员所能表演的）全部剧目(或曲目)
def_en: A performer's repertory is all the plays or pieces of music that he or she has learned and can perform.
